icon.color: cursor-pointer text-gray-200 hover:text-yellow-500 transition duration-1000 ease-in-out

page.grid: tailwind-grid grid-flow-row justify-center justify-items-center grid-cols-2 xl:row-gap-6 row-gap-2 gap-2 xl:gap-4 sm:grid-cols-3 md:grid-cols-4 lg:grid-cols-4 xl:grid-cols-6 2xl:grid-cols-8

footer.link: block pl-2 text-gray-400 hover:text-red-500 transition duration-1000 ease-in-out

paginator.container: pl-4 py-8 w-full flex self-center place-content-center
paginator.current: py-1 px-4 align-middle mx-1 text-center text-2xl text-bold text-white bg-blue-800 rounded-full
